name: Property Owner
description:
Press 'z' to roll the dice.

Move throughout the board and purchase properties. Upgrade a property by remodeling it by landing on a property you already own.

Collect payment for properties once you land on or pass the payment tile.

Events will happen through each turn. Hostile Takeover will take one over one property which you can buy back if you land on it. Tax increase will increase the tax cost for landing on the taxed tiles.

Avoid going bankrupt (losing all your money).

Complete all 25 turns to win the game.
